mapper.select: SELECT post_id, promo_title, promo_start_date, promo_end_date, promo_banner_img FROM promotion_post WHERE promo_status = 1 AND CURDATE() BETWEEN promo_start_date AND promo_end_date ORDER BY promo_created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT promo_code, promo_discount_type, promo_discount_value, promo_max_discount, promo_min_purchase, promo_start_date, promo_end_date FROM promotion_coupon WHERE promo_coupon_active = 1 AND CURDATE() BETWEEN promo_start_date AND promo_end_date AND (m_id IS NULL OR m_id = #{mId}) ORDER BY promo_end_date ASC LIMIT #{limit}
